players.name: Bob
memory:
You: "
I am innocent and saw Alice with suspicious behavior last night.
"
Diana: "I don't think Bob is telling the truth, I saw him talking to Alice last night."
You: "I saw Alice last night, but I didn't kill her. Diana might be mistaken."
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso, I investigated him last night and found evidence. We should lynch him."
